unittitle_ssm: Dwight B. Demeritt, Jr. Brooklyn Navy Yard photographs and negatives
abstract_ssm: The collection includes exterior views of Marine Hospital and gate house; views of the Barrier Forts Monument, the Navy Yard bell, and cannons located outside of Marine Hospital; exterior and interior views of the Chief Surgeon's Quarters; several copy prints of floor plans for the Chief Surgeon's Quarters (circa 1865); and one copy print of the plan of the Brooklyn Navy Yard (1860).
